trans-unit.source: Describes how abstract content is mapped into a concrete format.
trans-unit.target: Descreve como abstrato conteúdo é mapeado para um formato concreto.

trans-unit.source: This abstract class forms the base class for the following classes: - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.FaultBinding> - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.InputBinding> - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OutputBinding>
trans-unit.target: Essa classe abstrata formulários a classe base para as classes a seguir:- <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.FaultBinding>- <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.InputBinding>- <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OutputBinding></xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OutputBinding> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.InputBinding> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.FaultBinding>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"></xref> of which the current <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding"></xref> is a member.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"> </xref> deles atual <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding"> </xref> é um membro.

trans-unit.source: Each of the classes derived from the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding> class corresponds to a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) element (`<input>`, `<output>` or `<fault>`) enclosed by the `<operation>` element, which is in turn enclosed by the `<binding>` element.
trans-unit.target: Cada uma das classes derivadas do <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding>classe corresponde a um elemento WSDL Web Services Description Language () (`<input>`, `<output>` ou `<fault>`) entre o `<operation>` elemento, que por sua vez colocado entre o `<binding>` elemento.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding> class corresponds to that `<operation>` element in the WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding>classe corresponde àquela `<operation>` elemento no documento WSDL.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding>

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre WSDL, consulte a especificação em http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"></xref> of which the current <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding"></xref> is a member.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding"> </xref> deles atual <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding"> </xref> é um membro.
